name: Protect the Tree!
description:
Made for a game jam. You have to protect a tree from a bear attacking it. All you have to do is click the bear.

Simple right? Well your cursor is hidden, and the only way to locate your cursor is using the arrow compass.

You can also put your cursor in front of the bear to stop it from walking, but make sure that the tree doesn't get too low.

Music: Fortress Boss - Super Mario World
